Home.Body: Your eyes are closed. All you can see is a jumble of unclear thoughts as you lie still at your bedroom floor. You decide to reach out to open the door.

Train Station.Body: Suddenly, you find your parents outside your bedroom and they seem to kidnap you. When you awake, you find yourself in a train, looking outside the window to see your parents mouthing out the words: 'this is good for you'. All you can do is ride the train.

Train.Body: You ride the train. Suddenly, the view through the windows, along with the walls begin to warp. The reality shaking nature of this seems to knock you out.

Divide in the Forest Path.Body: You open your eyes to find yourself in a forest. There's a divide in the path ahead of you. Which will you take?

Shadowy Marsh Path.Body: You enter the Shadowy Marsh Path. It's extremely dark. As you walk further, your feet sinks in deeper into the ground with each further step.

Deep into the Shadowy Marsh.Body: You enter deep into the shadowy marsh. There you find a crevice with a feint light shining through. You decide to squeeze through. With all your might, nearly crushing your chest you push through to find something rather interesting.

Interactions.Interaction: You pick up the radiant mushroom. It has the power to reveal roses among thorns.

End of the Marsh Path.Body: You reach the end of the shadowy marsh path. All that's left is a wall full of moss. Not knowing what to do, you close your eyes and reach out.

Vibrant Forest Floor.Body: You enter the vibrant forest floor. It's full of a diverse range of flowers that decorate the surroundings in a rainbow of colors. You decide to explore it further.

Choices.Target: Deep into the Vibrant Forest Floor

Deep into the Vibrant Forest Floor.Body: You go deeper into the vibrant forest floor. You find a strange looking flower. What will you do?

Interactions.Interaction: The strange looking flower states that it echoes the voices of what it once heard. To keep it from copying your voice, you decide not to say anything.

Choices.Target: Deeper into the Vibrant Forest Floor

Deeper into the Vibrant Forest Floor.Body: You move on only to find another strange looking flower.

Interactions.Interaction: For flowers to bloom, for freedom to be achieved, one must find the light that radiates through the darkness.

Choices.Target: Deep into the Vibrant Forest Floor

Wall of Thorns.Body: You eventually reach a wall of thorns. It appears to be covering the flowers that used to bloom beneath it.

Interactions.Hidden: Use the radiant mushroom to free the flowers beneath the thorns

Choices.Target: Deeper into the Vibrant Forest Floor

Home Part 2.Body: Using the radient mushroom, you clear a path to that opens the door. When you step in, you find yourself back in your room where you were once lying.

Beyond.Body: You decide to open your eyes, and go beyond to explore the unkown.
